name: Open a local port through Windows Firewall to any profile
description: This test will attempt to open a local port defined by input arguments to any profile

data.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Open Port to Any" dir=in protocol=tcp localport=#{local_port} action=allow profile=any
netsh advfirewall firewall delete rule name="Open Port to Any" | Out-Null

input_arguments.name: local_port
input_arguments.description: This is the local port you wish to test opening
